course.title: Learn key life lessons from the Gita: Mind control and conflict resolution

about.html_content: Nityanand Charan Das is a practicing monk at Sri Sri Radha Gopinath Temple, ISKCON Chowpatty, Mumbai & a visionary who wishes to revolutionize the current urban scenario by aiding people in leading a life of purpose, fulfilment, and satisfaction. He also specializes in guiding today’s youth including children & teenagers to reconnect with their roots and lead a simple yet happy life.

what_to_expect.html_content:
• Learn to mange your relationships
  • Better communication
  • Time management
  • Forgiveness

key_topics.html_content:
1. 10 written and audio sessions guiding you in decoding the language of numbers so that you can easily receive their insights and messages.
  2. Intuitive exercises and homework walk you through the energies and values of numbers and number sequences so you can become your own authority.
  3. Handy reference to numerical meanings, so you can uncover your soul's gifts, challenges, lessons, and purpose – and receive spiritual guidance along your path.
  4. Expert techniques for manifestation offer simple ways to use numbers to co-create with the universe.

about_instructor.html_content: Nityanand Charan Das is a practicing monk at Sri Sri Radha Gopinath Temple, ISKCON Chowpatty, Mumbai & a visionary who wishes to revolutionize the current urban scenario by aiding people in leading a life of purpose, fulfilment, and satisfaction. He also specializes in guiding today’s youth including children & teenagers to reconnect with their roots and lead a simple yet happy life.

testimonial.text: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system.
